multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.
ONLY HIGHEST WIN PAYS PER LINE WIN COMBINATIONS PAY LEFT TO RIGHT EXCEPT SCATTER WHICH PAYS ANY PAYLINE WINS ARE MULTIPLIED BY THE LINE BET MALFUNCTIONS VOID ALL PLAYS AND PAYS

KING KONG IS UNDER ATTACK ATOP THE CITY TOWER
THREE TIMES YOU WILL BE FACED WITH 3 PLANES EACH TIME YOU MUST PICK 1 OUT OF 3 PLANES TO TAKE DOWN BY PRESSING THE CORRESPONDING ARROW EACH PLANE IS WORTH A CASH PRIZE
TAKING DOWN 3 PLANES ENDS THE CITY TOWER BONUS AND BEGINS JUNGLE MODE
OR MORE ANYWHERE ON REELS IN BIG CITY MODE
OR MORE ANYWHERE ON REELS IN BIG CITY MODE

THE PLAYER IS AWARDED 3 FREE RESPINS
IN THE 1ST RESPIN, ALL SYMBOLS ON REELS 1+5 ARE WILD, SUBSTITUTING FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER
IN THE 2ND RESPIN, ALL SYMBOLS ON REELS 2+4 ARE WILD, SUBSTITUTING FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER
IN THE 3RD RESPIN, ALL SYMBOLS ON REELS 1+3+5 ARE WILD, SUBSTITUTING FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER
CITY TOWER BONUS CANNOT BE TRIGGERED DURING THE RESPINS
FEATURE CANNOT BE RETRIGGERED
OR MORE ANYWHERE ON REELS IN JUNGLE MODE

BEFORE YOU IS A MAP OF SKULL ISLAND
CHOOSING A LOCATION ON THE MAP REVEALS 1 OF 3 CREATURES OR KING KONG
MATCH 3 CREATURES TO WIN A CASH PRIZE. EACH CREATURE IS WORTH A DIFFERENT CASH PRIZE. HOWEVER, UNCOVERING ONLY ONE KING KONG WINS THE BIGGEST PRIZE
WINNING A CASH PRIZE ENDS THE SKULL ISLAND BONUS AND BEGINS BIG CITY MODE
OR MORE ANYWHERE ON REELS IN JUNGLE MODE

PLAYER IS AWARDED 3 FREE RESPINS
EVERY TIME A WILD APPEARS, IT REMAINS FROZEN ON THE REELS UNTIL FEATURE ENDS, SUBSTITUTING FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER
SKULL ISLAND BONUS CANNOT BE TRIGGERED DURING THE RESPINS
ADDITIONAL WILDS ARE ADDED TO THE FEATURE REELS
FEATURE CANNOT BE RETRIGGERED

THE GAME IS PLAYED IN 2 MODES: JUNGLE MODE AND BIG CITY MODE
IN EACH OF THESE MODES, THE SYMBOLS CHANGE VISUALLY BUT THE PAYTABLE REMAINS THE SAME
JUNGLE MODE 3 OR MORE WILD ANYWHERE TRIGGERS THE WILD JUNGLE RESPINS FEATURE
3 OR MORE SCATTER ANYWHERE TRIGGERS THE SKULL ISLAND BONUS
BIG CITY MODE BEGINS WHEN EXITING SKULL ISLAND BONUS
BIG CITY MODE 3 OR MORE WILD ANYWHERE TRIGGERS THE WILD KONG RESPINS FEATURE
3 OR MORE SCATTER ANYWHERE TRIGGERS THE CITY TOWER BONUS
JUNGLE MODE BEGINS WHEN EXITING CITY TOWER BONUS
ENTER THE GAME IN JUNGLE MODE. RE-ENTER IN THE MODE YOU WERE PLAYING BEFORE EXITING
SUBSTITUTES FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER
3 OR MORE WILD ANYWHERE STARTS WILD JUNGLE RESPINS FEATURE!
3 OR MORE WILD ANYWHERE STARTS WILD KONG RESPINS FEATURE!
3 OR MORE SCATTER ANYWHERE WINS SKULL ISLAND BONUS!
3 OR MORE SCATTER ANYWHERE WINS CITY TOWER BONUS!
CREATURES ARE HIDING IN THE JUNGLE!
MATCH 3 CREATURES TO WIN FIND 1 KONG TO WIN BIG
GREAT, YOU DISCOVERED KING KONG! PICK AGAIN!
YOU DISCOVERED A VASTATOSAURUS REX! PICK AGAIN!
GREAT, YOU DISCOVERED ANOTHER VASTATOSAURUS REX! PICK AGAIN!
YOU DISCOVERED A VENATOSAURUS! PICK AGAIN!
GREAT, YOU DISCOVERED ANOTHER VENATOSAURUS! PICK AGAIN!
YOU DISCOVERED A BRONTOSAURUS! PICK AGAIN!
GREAT, YOU DISCOVERED ANOTHER BRONTOSAURUS! PICK AGAIN!
KONG IS ON THE LOOSE IN THE BIG CITY!
PLANES HAVE BEEN SENT TO TAKE HIM DOWN!
TAKE DOWN THE FIRST PLANE CLICK ON AN ARROW
TAKE DOWN THE SECOND PLANE CLICK ON AN ARROW
TAKE DOWN THE LAST PLANE CLICK ON AN ARROW

phrase.text: This bet is not currently available.
There has been an error retrieving your previous game, please refresh
You have exceeded the maximum possible winning limit for any one bet. Please change your bet or cashout.
Play for fun. If you would like to Play for Real, please log into or create an account.
You are part way through a game. Please click to resume.

KONG THE 8TH WONDER OF THE WORLD
5-Reel 20-line Slots The objective of KONG THE EIGHTH WONDER OF THE WORLD is to obtain winning symbol combinations by spinning the reels.
TO PLAY THE GAME:
*Line bets are chosen by clicking + or - below LINE BET to increase or decrease the amount. *Paylines are chosen by clicking + or - below LINES. Paylines can also be activated by using the numbered buttons on either side of the reels. Selecting a high payline includes all the lower ones too. For example, selecting payline 6 also activates paylines 1 through 5. Clicking BET MAX activates all paylines and spins the reels. *Total bet per game round = line bet X active paylines. *Clicking SPIN spins the reels with the current selection of lines and line bets. During the reel spins the SPIN button changes into Stop. Clicking STOP ends the spin animation and immediately displays the spin result. *Reels can also be spun using the AUTO PLAY function. Roll over the AUTO PLAY button to display the options: 10, 20, 30 or 50 spins. Clicking on any of them selects the successive number of spins to be enabled and spins the reels. The AUTO PLAY button changes into STOP during the AUTO PLAY mode of reelspin. The AUTO PLAY mode ends when the reels have been spun the number of times determined by the player, or when the player clicks STOP. If a bonus or feature is triggered during the AUTO PLAY mode, the feature begins after the player clicks on CLICK TO START. When the feature / bonus is complete, the player clicks on CONTINUE on the screen summarizing the win, the AUTO PLAY mode will then resume. *Wins are calculated according to the paytable. Line win = LINE BET X corresponding multiplier according to the paytable. SCATTER win = total bet X corresponding multiplier according to the paytable. The paytable can be accessed via the Info page. When opened after a winning spin, the winning symbol combinations (number of symbols and bet multiplier) are highlighted and blink. *On a given payline, only the highest payline winning combination pays while simultaneous winnings on different paylines are accumulated. *In case of a winning spin, the WIN field displays the accumulating winnings. The WIN ticker can be stopped by clicking anywhere on the screen to display the total WIN amount immediately.
INFO PAGE:
*Clicking INFO opens the reference screen describing different game components. Clicking the arrow buttons at the lower right-hand corner of the screen enables navigating between the different info screens.
PAYLINES:
*Active paylines are represented by lines that appear over the reels. *Only active paylines can register wins. The SCATTER symbol is an exception to these rules. More information about the SCATTER symbol can be found below.
WILD SYMBOL:
The WILD symbol in the game is the King Kong symbol with green background in Jungle Mode and King Kong symbol with blue background in Big City Mode. The symbols pay the same in both modes and differ only graphically. WILD can stand for any other symbol, except SCATTER, to make the best possible winning combination.
WILD JUNGLE RESPINS FEATURE:
If three or more WILD symbols appear in any position on the reels simultaneously, even off the paylines, during Jungle Mode, the Wild Jungle Respins feature is triggered. When this happens click on ‘CLICK TO START’ to start the feature. The player is awarded 3 free respins, during which more WILD symbols are added to the reels and every time a WILD symbol appears, it remains frozen until the feature ends. During the free respins, the reels are spun automatically using the same number of LINES and BET PER LINE as on the spin that won the feature. The skull island bonus cannot be triggered during the Wild Jungle Respins feature. The Wild Jungle Respins feature cannot be retriggered during the respins.
WILD KONG RESPINS FEATURE:
If three or more Wild symbols appear in any position on the reels simultaneously, even off the paylines, during Big City Mode, the Wild Kong Respins feature is triggered. When this happens click on ‘CLICK TO START’ to start the feature. The player is awarded 3 free respins. In the first respin, all symbols on reels #1 and #5 are WILD. In the second respin, all symbols on reels #2 and #4 are WILD. In the third respin, all symbols on reels #1, #3 and #5 are WILD. On the reels that are covered with WILDS, an animation is played of King Kong chasing a car in a city. The rest of the reels spin regularly. The WILD symbols substitute for all other symbols except SCATTER. During the free respins, the reels are spun automatically using the same number of LINES and BET PER LINE as on the spin that won the feature. The city tower bonus cannot be triggered during the Wild Kong Respins feature. The Wild Kong Respins feature cannot be retriggered during the respins.
SKULL ISLAND BONUS:
If three or more SCATTER symbols appear in any position on the reels simultaneously during Jungle mode, the skull island bonus is triggered. To start the Skull Island Bonus round, click on CLICK TO START. In the Skull Island Bonus, the player is presented a map with 13 locations. Click on a location to uncover one out of three creatures or King Kong. Play until you uncover three of the same kind of creature or until you have found one King Kong. Each creature is worth a different cash prize which is a multiple of the total bet of the spin that triggered the Skull Island Bonus (X10, X15 or X20 for creatures or X30 for King Kong). The maximum total amount that can be won from the Skull Island Bonus is 30 times the total bet of the spin that triggered the feature. At the end of the skull island bonus, a win screen displays your winnings. Click CONTINUE to return to the regular slot reels, where normal gameplay resumes in Big City Mode.
CITY TOWER BONUS:
If three or more SCATTER symbols appear in any position on the reels simultaneously during Big City mode, the City Tower Bonus is triggered. To start the City Tower Bonus round, click on Click to Start. In the City Tower Bonus, King Kong is on top of a high city tower, with planes flying around him. The player must pick 1 out of 3 planes on three separate occasions. Clicking on a selection wins a cash prize, which is a multiple of the total bet of the spin that triggered the City Tower Bonus (from X1 to X8) and begins a short clip in which King Kong takes down a plane. Once the clip is over, if there are any more selections to be made, the player is returned to the screen in which another plane must be picked. Taking down three planes ends the City Tower Bonus. The maximum total amount that can be won from the City Tower Bonus is 23 times the total bet of the spin that triggered the feature. At the end of the City Tower Bonus, a win screen displays your winnings. Click Continue to return to the regular slot reels, where normal gameplay resumes in Jungle Mode. This game has a Return to Player of 95.5%.
